scripts.start: npx prisma db push && npx prisma db seed && node server.js
scripts.postinstall: node -e "if (process.platform !== 'win32') { require('child_process').execSync('chmod +x node_modules/.bin/prisma', { stdio: 'inherit' }) } else { console.log('Skipping chmod on Windows') }"
scripts.migration:generate: npx prisma migrate diff --from-empty --to-schema-datamodel prisma/schema.prisma --script > prisma/migration.sql
